tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name STRING,
  environmental_impact_rating INT,
  recyclability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
    material_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    material_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    recyclable BOOLEAN,
    biodegradable BOOLEAN,
    compostable BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact (
    impact_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id UUID REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id),
    carbon_footprint FLOAT,
    energy_consumption FLOAT,
    water_usage FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE FoodProducts (
  product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(50),
  packaging_material_id INT,
  manufacturer_id INT,
  production_date DATE,
  expiration_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY(packaging_material_id) REFERENCES PackagingMaterials(packaging_material_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(manufacturer_id) REFERENCES PackagingManufacturers(manufacturer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE EnvironmentalImpactData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  packaging_material_id INT,
  recycling_rate FLOAT,
  carbon_footprint_metric FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY(packaging_material_id) REFERENCES PackagingMaterials(packaging_material_id)
);
